Sentencas: Strong restrictions on emissions from marine power plants (particularly SO NO) will probably be adopted in the near future.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: In this paper, a combined solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine fuelled by natural gas is proposed as an attractive option to limit the environmental impact of the marine sector It includes a study of a heat-recovery system for 18 MW SOFC fuelled by natural gas, to provide the electric power demand onboard commercial vessels.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Feasible heat-recovery systems are investigated, taking into account different operating conditions of the combined system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Two types of SOFC are considered, tubular and planar SOFCs, operated with either natural gas or hydrogen fuels.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: This paper includes a detailed thermodynamic analysis for the combined system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: Mass and energy balances are performed, not only for the whole plant but also for each individual component, in order to evaluate the thermal efficiency of the combined cycle.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: In addition, the effect of using natural gas as a fuel on the fuel cell voltage and performance is investigated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: It is found that a high overall efficiency approaching 70% may be achieved with an optimum configuration using SOFC system under pressure.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications

Sentencas: The hybrid system would also reduce emissions, fuel consumption, and improve the total system efficiency.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a combined gas turbine power plant with a solid oxide fuel cell for marine applications
